intro_only_event_buddiesjoin_pm0123_00_s:
I know it’s sudden, but would you have
a Pokémon battle with me?

My partner Pokémon will be this Scyther! Just like
Beedrill, he’s one of my prized Bug-type Pokémon!

We were just practicing our teamwork as a sync
pair, but it looks like he’s interested in joining your
team, too!

If we can show you a good battle, would you let
us join your team?

You will battle us, won’t you? It’d be great if
you could!
